meaningMnemonic:
A <kanji>courteous</kanji> <kanji>talk</kanji> is an <vocabulary>informal talk</vocabulary> where people gather and discuss something in a friendly way.

懇談 is often used for parent-teacher meetings or community meetings. It's an informal but courteous talk, usually between acquaintances rather than close friends.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
